q: Monday, questions posed to potential jurors strongly indicated that Davies, 49, may claim self-defense during the trial. Jury selection was continuing Tuesday, and opening statements in the case were expected on Wednesday. This case may be about alleged self-defense and the defense of others, Superior Court Judge Bernard DeLury told potential jurors.
